items.text: I believe that most people are basically honest and trustworthy.
I feel a strong urge to help people who are in difficult situations.
I feel that you have to be careful, or people will take advantage of you.
I find it rewarding to spend my time and energy helping others.
I try to approach strangers with good intentions and an open mind.
I believe I should focus on my own problems before worrying about others.
I think most people would deceive others if it served their self-interest.
I believe that charity and volunteering are vital for a better society.
I trust that the laws and systems in our society operate fairly.
I prefer not to invest effort into tasks that offer no personal reward.

T.high: You have a positive outlook and excel at building collaborative relationships.
T.low: You are a realist with a critical eye, skilled at risk management and self-protection.

A.high: You are a compassionate individual who adds immense value to your community.
A.low: You are pragmatic and independent, focusing on efficiency and personal goals.
